subs.text: April 21

I can never wear my watch while sleeping. I want my sleep to be comfortable ‚Äì one with a watch hugging my wrist isn‚Äôt. However, I am interested in recording my sleep pattern. It was possible with fitness bands, no longer is with a smartwatch.

subs.text: April 14

I am tired of websites with pop downs asking for permission to show notifications. Why would I enable that? Notifications are already a headache to manage, even the ones just from the apps. Why would I let websites also bug me incessantly?

subs.text: April 9

subs.text: April 6

subs.text: I have been very keen on listening to Audiobooks recently. The moment I have some spare time, I am listening to the audiobooks. That does not bode well for my other interests. I also blame the brilliant collection of books I have been recommendedüôÉ.
